translations: 不同意；持异议（dissent 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Very few dissenting voices were heard on the right of the party.
sentences.translation: 在党的右翼听不到什么不同的政见。

sentences.sentence: Ask yourself - could the dissenting opinion be right?
sentences.translation: 自问—分歧意见有没有可能是正确的？

sentences.sentence: The dissenting justices listed 40 troubling questions.
sentences.translation: 持不同意见的法官列举了40条头疼的问题。
